Title: DX11 (Win 7 & Win 8 Metro) import for C#
Description:
This project is a simple wrapper of DirectX 11 interfaces to .NET Library. Now, only Direct3D 11 is imported.
本项目是DX11的一个简单的.NET包装，当前只完成了D3D11。
Win7, Win8 Metro
